title: 프로젝트 지연 보고 (Business English)
description: PM에게 일정 지연을 비즈니스 톤으로 보고하고, 리스크와 액션을 제시한다.

stages.name: Opening
stages.content: Hi [Manager Name], I’d like to give you a quick update on the timeline...

stages.name: RiskSummary
stages.content: We’re currently one week behind due to integration issues with the payment gateway...

choices.text: Propose concrete mitigation (parallelize tests, add hotfix slot)

stages.name: AskSupport
stages.content: To get back on track, we need your help to prioritize...

stages.name: Closing
stages.content: If you agree, we can proceed with the adjusted plan and share a revised timeline by EOD.
